entry.def: If you describe someone as unapproachable, you mean that they seem to be difficult to talk to and not very friendly.

example.ex: She was somewhat unapproachable but I'm sure she wanted to be friendly.
example.tran: 她有些不好接近，但我确信她想表现得友好一些。
